message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a unique item that will bring you significant value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. Is this something you'd like to consider?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

I understand you have a budget in mind, Bob, but I'm afraid $10000 is a bit low considering the product's value to me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13000. This is the lowest I can go, and I think it's still a fair price considering the product's worth to me.
I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'm willing to pay $11500. I think this is a fair compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob, but I'm still not convinced that $11500 is a fair price for this product. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm thinking of $14000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
I understand that you're not willing to go any lower, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $12000, which is the highest I can go. I hope you can understand my position.
